unittitle_ssm: Manuscript and typescript histories of Ellis Island, N.Y.
abstract_ssm: Two brief histories of Ellis Island, one typewritten by the Immigration and Naturalization Service of the United States Department of Justice, dated 1947, and the other handwritten by a descendant of Samuel Ellis, dated 1951.
